reviews.text: Ate here last night, great service on arrival, quickly read the menu, and decided on the excellent specials. They realised I was alone, and offered, great seating on the couch or anywhere, I opted for outside as a beautiful night.
reviews.title: Excellent food & value

reviews.text: Was delivered food promptly, and didn't want for anything more. No additional seasonings required, food was just perfect.
reviews.title: The place to eat at!

reviews.text: I normally go to a different place each nigh to try them all, but decided, I'm back tonight to try something from the menu, maybe depending on the specials.
reviews.title: Excellent restaurant food and service
Delicious and classy
reviews.text: Nice outdoor area, and the dining room looked lovely also.

reviews.title: Worth seeking out when in Benalla

reviews.text: When overnighting in Benalla recently we were looking for a quality meal. We sure found it a the North Eastern Hotel. From the moment we walked into the lounge area, complete with open fires and cosy couches we were impressed. A wine list which included many local wines as well as a well planned menu that supported local producers. The food was excellent and presented beautifully. To round things out the staff, including our young waiter, were charming and attentive. This is a hotel not to be missed.
reviews.title: "Ambience,wonderful food and excellent service"
Quality food, friendly service
reviews.text: Benalla may not be loaded with fine dining options but the North Eastern Hotel would be a leading venue in any town or city.

reviews.title: Unwelcome.
reviews.text: The food was very very good - interesting and flavoursome, filling in size but not excessive. And the service was warm and friendly. It's a small restaurant so they can take their time with each diner. The ambience is also very pleasant, especially on a cool winter evening.

reviews.title: Surprising to find such great food in an out of the way location
reviews.text: It's not cheap but it's good value for what you get.

reviews.title: Beautiful meals - highly recommend!
reviews.text: 70th birthday almost ruined because of managers intransience.

reviews.title: Not your average pub experience!
reviews.text: Found this place on trip ad. And I would totally agree wirh the last two reviewers. Great service, the young waiter was friendly and the owners very comfortable to chat to. Food was exceptional, my mum had king fish, dad eye fillet with a talagio cheese parcel "superb". The duck was the slightest bit over cooked, but I thoroughly enjoyed it all the same.

We were reminded that we were dining in a pub when four very drunk blokes walked in to slobber and slump on the bar. When our publican politely refused them drinks things started to escalate. Two bouncers arrived, one strong man and a very small girl who must have got her courage from the land of Oz! The drunks were eventually pushed out the door and into the arms of the police! We were impressed with the way the staff dealt with the situation and were not in a hurry to let it spoil our night!
reviews.title: This is no ordinary pub!!!

reviews.text: We stayed for a good coffee and one of the best pannacottas I have had! Thank you to all of the team at The Norto, we will be back!
reviews.title: Outstanding Dining Experience with Exceptional Atmosphere

reviews.text: Was in Benalla for a week and had tried 2 different restuarants before being recommended this restuarant by a colleague. As one of the earlier reviewers commented you can't judge this place by the exterior. Inside is very well laid out, clean and more importantly the food was excellent. So much so that I came back the next night.
reviews.title: Surprising
Very Good Hotel Food
reviews.text: Hospitality was also very good and I would highly recommend this establishment.

reviews.title: One of our local haunts
reviews.text: The ambience is excellent and the food of restaurant quality. Prices reflect the fact that the hotel is more than a bistro and the staff are professional in manner
Fantastic, quality food, Classic decor. Great outdoor area. Always great service. One of our regular spots to eat.
reviews.title: Never judge a place by its outside.

reviews.text: The outside looks like any old style country pub, but step inside and you see a different side. We dined on a busy Friday night. From the moment we walked in, we were warmly welcomed, all the staff were tentative, knowledgeable and friendly. My elderly mother was catered for with a half serve of the "James Squire" beer battered fish n chips and stated it was the best she had eaten in her 85 yrs of life !!!!!!! All the other meals ordered from the menu were superb to say the least and could not find fault with any meal. The only down side was that we though the bar prices for drinks was on the higher side, other than that a fantastic meal was had by all.
reviews.title: A great suprize
